entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with drizzle ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Canada Bay area overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
